named-query.name: plan.getById
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Plan p WHERE p.id = :id AND p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false

named-query.name: plan.getAll
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Plan p WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false AND p.image.visible = true

named-query.name: plan.getAllForAdmin
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Plan p WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false

named-query.name: plan.countAllForAdmin
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(p) FROM Plan p WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false

named-query.name: plan.getAllForInstrumentIds
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN FlavourLimit fl ON fl.flavour.id = p.flavour.id AND fl.objectType = 'INSTRUMENT' WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false AND p.image.visible = true AND (fl.objectId IN :instrumentIds OR fl.objectId IS NULL)

named-query.name: plan.getAllForExperimentIds
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN FlavourLimit fl ON fl.flavour.id = p.flavour.id AND fl.objectType = 'INSTRUMENT' LEFT OUTER JOIN Experiment e ON e.instrument.id = fl.objectId WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false AND p.image.visible = true AND (e.id IN :experimentIds OR fl.objectId IS NULL)

named-query.name: plan.getAllForUserAndExperimentIds
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN FlavourLimit fl ON fl.flavour.id = p.flavour.id AND fl.objectType = 'INSTRUMENT' LEFT OUTER JOIN Experiment e ON e.instrument.id = fl.objectId LEFT OUTER JOIN InstrumentScientist ir on ir.instrument.id = fl.objectId WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false AND p.image.visible = true AND (ir.user = :user OR e.id IN :experimentIds OR fl.objectId IS NULL)

named-query.name: plan.getAllForAllInstruments
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN FlavourLimit fl ON fl.flavour.id = p.flavour.id AND fl.objectType = 'INSTRUMENT' WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false AND p.image.visible = true AND fl.objectId IS NULL

named-query.name: plan.getAllForUserAndAllInstruments
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p FROM Plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN FlavourLimit fl ON fl.flavour.id = p.flavour.id AND fl.objectType = 'INSTRUMENT' LEFT OUTER JOIN InstrumentScientist ir on ir.instrument.id = fl.objectId WHERE p.image.deleted = false AND p.flavour.deleted = false AND p.image.visible = true AND (ir.user = :user OR fl.objectId IS NULL)
